During testing, once the autopilot disengages and the alarm sounds, what button should you press to silence the alarm?
a: Either of the two A/P Disconnect buttons.

quiz.q: To run the AUTOLAND test, you should ________
a: Attach an MCDP remote control unit to the maintenance port
